property.name: Test_Step_0
property.value: Call Init task and expect the default data

property.value: Update CBOX power source POWER_SOURCE_BUB, Ecall not active

property.value: Battery is not connected and charge test is not in progress

property.value: Battery is connected and charge test is in progress

property.value: Battery is connected and charge test is done

property.value: Get Backup Battery connection status connected

property.value: Get Backup Battery connection status disconnected

property.value: Request for deactivate the backup battery

property.value: Test for Backup Battery standby allowed

property.name: Test_Step_20
property.value: Test for Backup Battery standby not allowed

property.name: Test_Step_22
property.value: Set state of health checke enable to TRUE
